home.description: CryptLab is a set of tools to help you use different types of ciphers.

nav.title: Navigation and menus
nav.sidenav: Select the cipher you wish to use on the left navigation bar, which can be opened by pressing
nav.alphabet: Change the alphabet used by the ciphers using

key.title: Key section
key.introduction: Each cipher has a key input section similar to this one:
key.different: Not all ciphers have the same input section, some use sliders, matrices, spinners, and more.

validators.1: Certain types of ciphers have an icon which indicates if everything is correct
validators.3: . Hovering over these icons gives you detailed information about the problem.

operator.title: Cipher operation section
operator.introduction: Similarly, ciphers have these sections, which allow to perform the cipher operation with the selected key:
operator.read-only: The textbox on the left is the input and the one on the right is read-only output.

process.1: To perform an operation, you must either manually click the
process.3: , which automatically processes the input as it changes.

options.2: , which removes all whitespace when enabled, and
options.3: , which automatically transforms the input into lowercase before processing it.

cryptlab.description: CryptLab was an assigment for the Information Security class of Burgos University (UBU)

rorik.description: Computer Science major, full stack developer, reverse engineering, embedded systems security, electronics.

reversible.false: Non-reversible encryption, matrix must be invertible

new.title: Create new alphabet
new.description: Write all the characters of the new alphabet
